subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is in Jaipur?
C_en: Cenotaph of Maharaja Sawai Man Singh
C_hi: महाराजा सवाई सावाई मान सिंग के संगत विमान
explanation_en: The Hawa Mahal, also known as Palace of Winds, is a famous monument located in Jaipur.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who is the current Chief Minister of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Om Prakash Meena is the current Chief Minister of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: ओम प्रकाश मेने राजस्थान के अंगनांग सिंग के अंगनांग सिंग के अंगनांग सिंग
explanation_en: Sanwaria Singh (सनवारी सिंग) is the current Chief Minister of Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital city of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jodhpur is the capital city of Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the symbol of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Rajasthan's state emblem consists of palaces, forts, and other regal symbols.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान का राजधान मेंत्र के विमेंत्र के राजधान

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which royal family did Rana Kumbha belong to?
explanation_en: Rana Pratap Singh, also known as Rana Pratap Singh, is a famous Rajput Rajput king who ruled during the 13th century.
